general.changNavigator:
We are a small team of volunteers and the needed development works to ensure the portability to your browser are not yet completed.
You will have an optimal user experience using Chrome browser or its open-source version Chromium.

forbidden.noAccess: You don't have access to this page

notFound.noAddress: Sorry, we can't find a page at this address.

workInProgress.nofunction: This feature is not yet enabled

layout.betaVersion: System-D.org is still in a beta version!
layout.betaExplain: You can probably find bugs or unusable/improvable features. We strive to make the user experience as enjoyable as possible despite very limited means (a volunteer developer helped occasionally by his friends).
layout.betaExplainEnd: and by sending us the bugs you encountered or ideas to improve existing or new features.
layout.betaWarning: The encryption protocol has been carefully designed to ensure the optimal protection of your data. That said, it has still not benefit from either in-depth expertise or penetration tests by experimented hackers.
layout.betaWarning2: The privacy and encryption of the user's data is a priority for us. However, we can not guarantee the inviolability of the data for our users. You should keep this in mind.
layout.help: Report a vulnerability or a security problem...

menu.noProject: You have not join any project.
menu.clic: You can click on the button below to create a project or wait for an invitation to an existing one.

accessDenied.noAccess: You don't have the authorization to access to this page! Please login.

notifItem.acceptedInvitation: An invitation has been accepted and a new member joined the project.
notifItem.memberQuit: A member has quit the project.
notifItem.memberPromoted: You now have admin rights on the project.
notifItem.newPublication: A new publication has been added in a followed topic
notifItem.newResponse: A comment has been made after your message
notifItem.newMapMarker: A new marker has been positioned on the map
notifItem.newInvitation: You have been invited to participate to an activity

showAcceptNotif.showAcceptNotifs: Click accept to be notified by your project activities
showAcceptNotif.showAcceptNotifsInfos: You will be able to adjust or disable the notifications later

landingAim.purpose: Develop a tool to support the transition from a collapsing money society to a production model based on the free exchange, the sharing and the collaboration between humans.
landingAim.createTool: Create a project management tool open to everyone.
landingAim.cTool: A tool that will enable different groups and associations to organize themselves efficiently. A tool which is encrypted, free, open-source and aiming to promote horizontalization in project management.
landingAim.doOfSystemD: Make System-D the social network of non-commercial projects
landingAim.dOfSystD: Creation of interfaces allowing the platform to be the user's traffic and meeting place through different projects: geolocated research by skills and centers of interest, encrypted mails, shared blogs, etc...
landingAim.developFreeNetwork: To develop a free and sharing network
landingAim.dFreeNetwork: Allow users and projects to share their resources in order to create a free and large non-commercial network.

landingContact.github: Follow the progress of project, make issues and pull requests.
landingContact.email: Contact me by email to share yours observations, ideas, suggestions, propositions...
landingContact.chat: Join us on the chat to discuss with the team of the project.

landingPlus.panonymous: Login with a pseudo, no email needed, and use a tor browser for more anonymity.
landingPlus.pfree: How can you picture a platform which purpose is to promote free exchange between humans differently?
landingPlus.pencrypted: The content you share and the list of the projects you are involved in are encrypted "end-to-end".

landingRoadmap.pfirstPhase: Creation of user accounts and connection to platform interface.
landingRoadmap.p4firstPhase: Invitation to projects and member management.
landingRoadmap.p7firstPhase: List of ergonomics tasks for each project.
landingRoadmap.p8firstPhase: Interface to support or participate to System-D
landingRoadmap.psecondPhase: Interface to allow each user to talk about their skills.
landingRoadmap.p2secondPhase: Interface that allows each user to select their center of interest
landingRoadmap.p4secondPhase: Advanced research tools to research potentials contributors / interesting projects.
landingRoadmap.pthirdPhase: Taking in consideration issues and improvements.
landingRoadmap.p2thirdPhase: Interface to list shared materials assets.
landingRoadmap.p4thirdPhase: Possibility to make advertisements for personals and projects requirements.

landingTitle.h3title: Encrypted platform for collaborative and free projects
landingTitle.ptitle: Make projects, join your friends, and take advantage of free and secure tools to organize your association or group together.

landingTools.pcalendar: To plan with your group the next events of your project.
landingTools.ptaskList: To see the progress of the project and to select tasks interactively by the participants.
landingTools.pforum: Communicate together, by themes or not.
landingTools.pmodularTools: Interactive map, planning in agile method, and others tools will develop.
landingTools.psimpleTools: user friendly organization tools and encrypted content for optimum privacy.

landingCounter.joinToo: Sign-in and have fun with a useful, free and cyphered tool for organise your projects with your friends, your associations or collectives.

loginFormJs.key: Recovering and decrypting the private key

signinFormJs.name4: your username requires at least 4 characters
signinFormJs.name40: your username requires can't be longer than 40 characters
signinFormJs.errmail: your username can't be an email address
signinFormJs.crypt: Encryption of your contents in System-D is based on your password. In order to help us secure your data, be sure to use a strong password.
signinFormJs.up: in order to increase the strength of your password.
signinFormJs.strength: The strength of your password must be at least 10

signinContainer.psignin: System-D offers you a free collaborative workspace and totally
signinContainer.p2signin: Like Telegram or Signal, only you and the other project members will be able to decrypt and read the content you post. Even developers won't have access to your data.
signinContainer.p3-2signin: of his users: neither email required or personal information. However we will not be able
signinContainer.p3-3signin: We can't help you if you forget your password.

newProjectJs.name4: your project name requires at  least 4 characters
newProjectJs.name50: your project name requires at least 50 characters
newProjectJs.errmail: your project name can't be an email address

deleteProject.deleteProjectInfo: You will remove this project for good
deleteProject.deleteProjectErrorTips: There is still members in this project

newInvitation.title: Invitation link creation
newInvitation.infoQuote: By transmitting invitations links, you are transmitting the project ciphers keys to everyone who has access to the link during the validity duration of the generated link.

showInvitation.title: Invitation link
showInvitation.infoLink: copy this link and send it to the person(s) you want to invite in your project.
showInvitation.invitMessage: You have been invited by someone to join a project on System-D: the free encrypted web-platform for collaborative projects. Click on the link below to see the invitation.
showInvitation.infoQr: If the person you want to invite is near you, he or she can scan this QR-code to access the invitation.
showInvitation.infoDestroy: By deleting the invitation, you delete the possibility to use the invitation link to access the encryption keys of your project.
showInvitation.deleted: The invitation link has been deleted

invitationList.noInvits: There is no valid invitation link.

invitation.title: Invitation to join a project
invitation.userAlreadyInProject: You already are a member of this project
invitation.noLongerExistInfo: Ask to the person who sent the invitation to send it again.
invitation.needToLoginFirst: You must be connected to accept the invitation
invitation.needToLoginFirstInfo: Click on the button to login or register to join the project.

member.quitProjectErrorTips: Design at least one new admin for the project.
member.quitProjectInfo: You will be removed from the project members.
member.promoteUserInfo: The user will be able to invite members or to kick them out.
member.kickUserInfo: Remove user from the members of the project
member.removedSuccess: The user has been removed from the project members
member.promoteSuccess: The user is now admin of the project

editPasswordJs.encryptionKey: Encryption of private key from new password

userParams.peditPassword: We will not be able to help you if you forget your password. It is recommended to write your password somewhere.
userParams.pdeleteAccount: THE DELETION OF YOUR ACCOUNT WILL BE DEFINITIVE.
userParams.passwordDeleteAccount: Enter your password to confirm the deletion of your account.

projectTasks.title: Tasks list
projectTasks.inProjectDetail: Les taches placées ici n'ont pas encore de date fixée.
projectTasks.calendarPlacedDetail: Les taches placées sont placées dans l'agenda avec des dates dans le futur.
projectTasks.waitingForStatusDetail: Les taches se trouvant dans cette section ont étés placées sur l'agenda, mais leurs dates est dépassée. A vous de voir si elles doivent etre remises en projet, replanifiées, ou si on peut les considerer comme terminées
projectTasks.doneDetail: Cette section regroupe les taches qui ont étés considérées comme terminées.

donate.title: Support System-D
donate.whyText: System-D project has been made with the heart, on free time. If you want it to continue and if you want to offer more free time  to the people who make it live so that they can develop new features and improve the existing ones, your donations are important.
donate.servers: To pay the hosting costs of the platform for an constantly increasing number of user
donate.sustain: To sustain and improve the features of System-D, make them accessible to a large amounts of users, and take into account the users feedback.
donate.develop: To create new features. Our todo list :
donate.next1: Instant chats between users, users and projects, projects.
donate.next2: Allow users to search a project or an user by localization, skills, center of interest, type of activity.
donate.ponctualInfo: Send a one-time donation on our Paypal account :
donate.recursiveInfo: Give a little money every month to System-D to sustain its long-term development with the LiberaPay open-source and free platform :
donate.donateIn: Send a donation on the System-D wallet

spreadsheetHeader.uploadWarning: Attention, toutes les données du tableur seront écrasées définitivement par les données du fichier csv !
